<@456226577798135808> Moving conversation to here from <#672059911034634243>:
> What if in a Blockchain all nodes die for some reasons what happens to DLT ?
> Can it be recovered, what if all the data dies with nodes any backup kinda facility ?
This type of scenario is generally deemed so unlikely that no one has spent any time thinking about it.  Even something like a global EMP is likely to not disable *every* device, as some are hardened or are housed inside of hardened facilities.
